702338f-a.title: Brooklyn: 4th Avenue - 39th Street
702338f-a.text:
4th Avenue, west side, south from 39th Street. Extending
from 40th to 41st Streets is Public School No. 136. At 42nd
Street is St. Michaels Roman Catholic Church.
September 8, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIOONS

702743f-a.title: Brooklyn: 39th Street - 4th Avenue
702743f-a.text:
39th Street, west from near Foirth Aenue toward the upper
New  York Bay. On Third Avenue is the B. M. T. elevated structure.
The street-car tracks 1ead to the ferry which operates from the
foot of 39th Sereet to St. George, Staten Island.
September 8, 1940
L. Sperr
NO REPRODUTTIONS
